Question
========
A golf club hits a golf ball with a force of 2400 N. The golf ball hits the club with a force

Answerlist
----------
* more than 2400 N
* less than 2400 N
* 2400 N
* not enough information to determine

Solution
========
According to Newton's Third Law of Motion, the golf ball exerts the same force
back on the club. The answer is exactly 2400 N.
